english.segment1: Gloriously You saved me. You saved me. So miraculously. You made me brand new. You welcomed me with open arms. Open arms. Unfailingly. Your love is a river
english.segment2: So I will praise You. I will praise You
english.segment3: Ill praise Your name. Forever and a day. And Ill live for You into eternity. Ill praise Your name. Forever and a day. And Ill live what I sing. What I say. What Im learning everyday
english.segment4: Generously You gave me. You gave me. Marvelously You made me. You made me. Relentlessly I follow. I follow. Your majesty, breathtaking. So beautiful.
